title: Item Sets for Alpha Client?
body:
As the Title suggests, there is no Item Sets in the Alpha Client. I wonder why. I was going to make an Item Set for Nasus, but I noticed there is no Item Sets. Or am I just not seeing it? :/
Do you think you'll add it back, Riot? :D

replies.body: Items lists don't currently appear to be in the updated client.  I don't have any insight on this, so you may want to ask about it in the [client discussions](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Good luck!

Thanks, I'll go ask there. :D
Thanks for the reply as well!
